body: A toll is sometimes charged to cross a well-kept and well-guarded road to pay for patrols on it and for its upkeep. Occasionally, a large, walled city charges a toll to enter or exit (or sometimes just to enter).
name: Road or Gate Toll
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Equipment/Goods And Services/Spellcasting and Services/Road or Gate Toll
